memberdef.argsstring: (HANDLE handle, unsigned long pinId, unsigned long property, void *value, unsigned long valueSize)
memberdef.name: WdmGetPinPropertySimple

memberdef.argsstring: (HANDLE handle, unsigned long pinId, unsigned long property, KSMULTIPLE_ITEM **ksMultipleItem)
memberdef.name: WdmGetPinPropertyMulti

memberdef.argsstring: (HANDLE deviceHandle, int pinId, unsigned long property, const GUID *identifierSet, unsigned long identifierId)
memberdef.name: KSFilterPinPropertyIdentifiersInclude

detaileddescription.para: Query for the maximum number of channels supported by any pin of the specified device. Returns 0 if the query fails for any reason.

parameterdescription.para: A system level PnP interface path, supplied as a WCHAR unicode string. Declard as void* to avoid introducing a dependency on wchar_t here.
A flag specifying whether to query for input (non-zero) or output (zero) channels.
